text:
@nowthisnews I know that I shouldn't pray for this pastor to get the coronavirus, but it's taking every bit of will power I possess to stop me. Not sure how long I can hold out.

While on that subject ... here's a snapshot. Looks kind of like a fruit salad. https://t.co/0qRGFDsA5M
